sentences.sentence: I think any sport involving harm to animals is barbaric and uncivilized.
sentences.translation: 我认为，任何伤害到动物的体育运动都是野蛮的、不文明的。

sentences.sentence: I have worked in the wildest and most uncivilized parts of the world.
sentences.translation: 我曾在世界上最荒凉、最原始的地区工作过。

sentences.sentence: It takes the most cool-headed and good-tempered of drivers to resist the temptation to revenge when subjected to uncivilized behavior.
sentences.translation: 当遇到不文明的行为时，只有头脑最冷静、脾气最好的司机才能抵制报复的诱惑。
